alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued October 03 at 2:04PM EDT until October 05 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EDT WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, minor coastal flooding. For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Coastal Broward County and Coastal Miami Dade County. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 4 PM EDT Wednesday. For the High Rip Current Risk, through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * VIRGINIA KEY HIGH TIDE TIMES...1230 AM EDT tonight and 111 PM EDT Tuesday.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County
